attributes.action: Mike Ashley to leave Newcastle United football club.
attributes.background: Mike Ashley has been running this club to the ground since he took over as owner 10 years ago. In his time we have seen 2 relegations, The name of our ground changed, no passion or commitment, no want to win. This man needs to leave our club.

rejection.details: The issue you've highlighted is not something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.
